## IpfsStorage.uploadBatchWithFileNames() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
uploadBatchWithFileNames(files: FileOrBufferWithNames[], contractAddress?: string): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  files | FileOrBufferWithNames\[\] | Array of file along with their filenames (required in case they are not <code>File</code> objects) |
|  contractAddress | string | - Optional. The contract address the data belongs to. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

The IPFS URI of the folder
